item.title: 美国银行预计美联储将于 12 月降息，2026 年再降息两次
item.description: 博雅全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）周一表示，目前预计美国联邦储备委员会将在 12 月份的会议上降息 25 个基点，理由是劳动力市场状况疲软，而且决策者最近的言论暗示将提前降息。【原文：BofA Global Research on Monday said it now expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to cut interest rates by 25 basis points at its December meeting, citing weak labor market conditions and recent comments from policymakers hinting at an early cut.】

item.title: Adobe Analytics 预测，美国 "网络星期一 "消费将达到 142 亿美元
item.description: Adobe Analytics 的一份报告预测，由于预算有限的消费者热衷于网上折扣，美国购物者预计将在 "网络星期一 "消费 142 亿美元。【原文：U.S. shoppers are expected to spend $14.2 billion on Cyber Monday, a report from Adobe Analytics predicted, as budget-strained consumers lap up online discounts.】

item.title: Nvidia 向芯片设计软件提供商 Synopsys 投资 20 亿美元
item.description: 人工智能芯片领军企业英伟达（Nvidia）向半导体设计软件提供商新思科技（Synopsys）投资 20 亿美元，这是该公司在人工智能生态系统中新建立的一系列合作伙伴关系中的又一笔投资，因为人们担心这种循环交易会越来越多。【原文：AI chip leader Nvidia has invested $2 billion in semiconductor design software provider Synopsys , adding to its slew of new partnerships in the artificial intelligence ecosystem amid concerns of increasingly circular deals.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，在 IPG 被收购后，宏盟将裁员 4000 人，并关闭多家代理机构
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周一援引对公司高管的采访报道称，在斥资 135 亿美元收购竞争对手 Interpublic 集团后，宏盟集团将裁员 4000 多人，并关闭多个知名广告代理品牌。【原文：Omnicom will lay off more than 4,000 employees and shut several well-known advertising agency brands after its $13.5 billion acquisition of rival Interpublic Group, the Financial Times reported on Monday, citing an interview with company executives.】

item.title: Stellantis 首席执行官支持德国在关键审查前推动放宽欧盟汽车排放规定
item.description: Stellantis 首席执行官 Antonio Filosa 周一对柏林呼吁放宽欧盟汽车尾气排放规定表示欢迎，称德国的建议符合行业要求，可以重振陷入困境的汽车行业。【原文：Stellantis Chief Executive Antonio Filosa on Monday welcomed Berlin's call to soften European Union car emissions rules, saying Germany's proposals aligned with industry demands to revive growth in the struggling sector.】

item.title: 高盛将以 20 亿美元收购创新者资本公司
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）周一表示，将以现金加股票的方式收购交易所交易基金赞助商创新者资本管理公司（Innovator Capital Management），交易价值约为 20 亿美元，这家华尔街银行正寻求在资产管理领域增长最快的领域之一进行扩张。【原文：Goldman Sachs said on Monday it will acquire exchange-traded fund sponsor Innovator Capital Management in a cash-and-stock deal worth about $2 billion, as the Wall Street bank seeks to expand in one of the fastest-growing segments of asset management.】

item.title: 加拿大巴里克矿业公司探讨北美资产的首次公开募股
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining）周一表示，在金银价格创纪录反弹之际，该公司正在探索对一家子公司进行首次公开募股，该公司将持有其北美黄金资产。【原文：Barrick Mining said on Monday it was exploring an initial public offering of a subsidiary that would hold its North American gold assets amid a record rally in bullion prices.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国和英国将就药品零关税达成一致，并有望宣布这一消息
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的消息人士透露，英国和美国准备就药品零关税达成一致，并将于周一在白宫宣布。【原文：Britain and the United States are poised to agree to zero tariffs on pharmaceutical products, with an announcement due at the White House on Monday, according to two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰晤士报》称英美准备达成药品零关税协议
item.description: 据《泰晤士报》周一报道，英国即将与美国达成一项重要的药品协议，这将意味着美国对药品实行零进口关税，并将导致英国国家医疗服务体系（NHS）的药品支出增加。【原文：The UK is poised to agree on a major pharmaceuticals deal with the U.S., which will mean zero import tariffs on pharmaceutical products into the U.S. and lead to an increase in NHS spending on medicines, The Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 印度电子商务公司 Meesho 借助人工智能和新业务线推动增长
item.description: 软银支持的印度电子商务公司 Meesho 创始人兼首席执行官维迪特-阿特雷（Vidit Aatrey）在接受路透社采访时表示，该公司正加倍努力发展人工智能和新的业务线，以扩大用户群并实现盈利。【原文：SoftBank-backed Indian e-commerce firm Meesho is doubling down on artificial intelligence and new business lines to expand its user base and move towards profitability, founder and CEO Vidit Aatrey told Reuters in an interview.】

item.title: 早间竞标年末远非平静
item.description: 动荡的 2025 年最后一个月的贸易正在进行中。以下是美国和全球市场的未来一天。【原文：Trade in the final month of a turbulent 2025 is underway. Here's a look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话和制造业数据公布前，华尔街期货下滑
item.description: 美国股指期货周一下滑，投资者转而观望，为新的经济数据和备受关注的美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的讲话做准备，以判断央行本月晚些时候的政策决定。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Monday as investors moved to the sidelines, bracing for fresh economic data and a closely watched speech from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to gauge the central bank's policy decision later this month.】

item.title: 加拿大银行第四季度盈利预期强劲
item.description: 分析师预计，加拿大银行本周将公布强劲的第四季度业绩，受益于投资银行和财富管理部门的业务，同时信贷继续保持稳定，但高估值将面临考验。【原文：Analysts are expecting Canadian banks to report strong fourth-quarter results this week, benefiting from business at their investment banking and wealth management segments while credit continues to stabilize, although lofty valuations will be tested.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰为追逐收益率和 "热钱 "的投资者和资产管理公司提供了可资借鉴的机会
item.description: 蓝猫头鹰公司在过去两周内做出的迂回决定--先是合并，然后又不合并，再后来可能合并旗下的两只私人信贷基金--给追求高收益的散户投资者和追逐富豪们带来的数十亿 "热钱 "的资产管理公司上了一堂警示课。【原文：Blue Owl's turnabout decisions in the last two weeks – to merge, and then not merge, and then maybe merge two of its private credit funds at a later time – offer a cautionary lesson for retail investors in search of higher yields and the asset managers chasing the billions in "hot money" wealthy individuals bring.】

item.title: 美联储即将召开的会议上异议纷至沓来，可能带来市场和政治风险
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（美联储）有时会被批评为过于受共识驱动，它可能会在利率问题上出现表决分歧，这可能会削弱其政策信息，并加剧人们对其独立性不受政治影响的疑虑。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve, sometimes criticized for being too consensus-driven, may see a run of divided votes on interest rates that could weaken its policy message and intensify doubts about its independence from political influence.】

item.title: 美国最高法院将审理考克斯与唱片公司之间的版权纠纷案
item.description: 美国最高法院将于周一听取考克斯通信公司（Cox Communications）在一起重大音乐版权诉讼案中的辩论，唱片公司指控这家互联网服务提供商允许其客户盗版数千首歌曲，考克斯通信公司希望避免承担经济责任。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court is set to hear arguments on Monday in a bid by Cox Communications to avoid financial liability in a major music copyright lawsuit by record labels that accused the internet service provider of enabling its customers to pirate thousands of songs.】

item.title: 独家报道空客数十架A320喷气机面临新的质量问题
item.description: 业内消息人士周一称，空中客车公司发现了一个工业质量问题，影响到几十架 A320 系列飞机的机身面板。【原文：Airbus has discovered an industrial quality issue affecting fuselage panels of several dozen A320-family aircraft, industry sources said on Monday.】

item.title: 贡渥集团管理人员买断首席执行官托恩奎斯特，公司寻求 "最终重置
item.description: 全球大宗商品贸易公司贡渥集团（GGL.UL）首席执行官托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjorn Tornqvist）将在管理层收购中下台并出售其全部股权，几周前美国因该公司过去与俄罗斯的联系而将其称为 "克里姆林宫的傀儡"。【原文：Global commodity trading house Gunvor's (GGL.UL) CEO Torbjorn Tornqvist will step down and sell his full shareholding in a management buyout, weeks after the U.S. dubbed the firm the "Kremlin's puppet" over its past Russian links.】

item.title: 乌克兰科技部表示，乌克兰正在利用谷歌开放技术开发独立的人工智能系统
item.description: 乌克兰数字部和移动运营商基辅之星（Kyivstar）周一表示，乌克兰正在利用谷歌的开放式 Gemma 框架开发一个大型语言模型，旨在建立一个独立的人工智能操作系统，满足军事和民用部门日益增长的需求。【原文：Ukraine is developing a large language model using Google's open-weight Gemma framework, aiming to create an independent system for artificial intelligence operations amid rising demand across military and civilian sectors, the country's digital ministry and mobile operator Kyivstar said on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉创下挪威汽车年销量纪录
item.description: 周一的登记数据显示，电动汽车制造商特斯拉2025年在挪威的汽车销量超过了其他任何汽车制造商全年的销量，在还有一个月的时间里就打破了挪威的年销量纪录，这对首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）来说是一个难得的亮点。【原文：Electric-vehicle maker Tesla has sold more cars in Norway in 2025 than any other automaker ever did in a full year, registration data showed on Monday, beating the country's annual sales record with one month to spare in a rare bright spot for CEO Elon Musk.】

item.title: 中国股市缓慢反弹开始赢得投资者信任
item.description: 随着估值和稳定回报吸引外国投资者回流，基金经理们正在挑选中国工业股，并持有波动较大的科技股，押注长达两年之久的股市反弹能够经受住经济不景气的考验。【原文：Fund managers are picking Chinese industrial stocks and holding volatile tech shares, betting a two-year-old equities rally can withstand an economic rough patch, as valuations and steady returns lure foreign investors back.】

item.title: 投资者抛弃风险资产，比特币下跌 5%，跌破 90,000 美元
item.description: 比特币周一跌回 90,000 美元下方，扩大了自 2021 年加密货币崩盘以来的最大单月跌幅，原因是新的避险情绪驱使投资者撤出股票和数字资产。【原文：Bitcoin fell back below $90,000 on Monday, extending losses after its steepest monthly decline since the 2021 crypto crash, as renewed risk aversion drove investors out of stocks and digital assets.】

item.title: 监管机构称，苹果公司试图通过挑战处罚法来拖延印度反垄断案的审理
item.description: 印度反垄断监管机构在回应这家科技公司的法律挑战时告诉新德里一家法院，苹果公司正试图通过挑战印度的反垄断处罚法来拖延针对该公司的反垄断诉讼程序。【原文：Apple is attempting to stall antitrust proceedings against the company by challenging India's antitrust penalty law, India's antitrust regulator told a New Delhi court in response to the tech company's legal challenge.】

item.title: 字节跳动为中国智能手机推出人工智能语音助手
item.description: 中国科技巨头字节跳动（ByteDance）周一表示，它将推出一款人工智能语音控制工具，该工具将在中兴通讯（ZTE Corp）生产的智能手机上首次亮相，随后将适时在其他制造商的手机上推出。【原文：Chinese tech giant ByteDance said on Monday it is launching an artificial intelligence voice control tool that will debut on a smartphone made by ZTE Corp , before becoming available on phones from other manufacturers in due course.】

item.title: 特斯拉 11 月在欧洲主要市场大幅下滑，但在挪威的新车销量却大幅增长
item.description: 特斯拉11月份在法国、丹麦和瑞典的注册量比去年同期减少了一半，因为这家美国电动汽车制造商尽管推出了最畅销的Model Y的新版本，但仍在努力阻止欧洲市场份额的减少。【原文：Tesla saw November registrations in France, Denmark and Sweden halve from a year earlier, as the U.S. EV maker continued to struggle to stem market share losses in Europe despite rolling out new versions of its best-selling Model Y, but Norway bucked the trend with record sales in the month.】

item.title: 中国出口管制推动欧洲企业转移供应链
item.description: 一个欧洲游说团体周一表示，中国不断收紧的出口管制正促使欧洲企业在这个世界第二大经济体之外探索新的供应链能力，以寻求在中美贸易战中获得掩护。【原文：China's tightening export controls are pushing European firms to explore new supply chain capacity outside of the world's second-largest economy, a European lobbying group said on Monday, seeking cover from the U.S.-China trade war.】

item.title: 韩国警方调查 Coupang 公司大规模数据泄漏事件
item.description: 韩国警方周一表示，他们正在追踪 IP 地址，并调查 Coupang 可能存在的技术漏洞，因为这家电子商务巨头遭遇了该国十多年来最严重的数据泄露事件。【原文：South Korean police said on Monday that they are tracing IP addresses and looking into possible tech vulnerabilities at Coupang after the e-commerce giant suffered the country's worst data breach in over a decade.】

item.title: 汇丰银行与法国初创公司 Mistral 合作，加速生成式人工智能的推广
item.description: 汇丰银行周一表示，它已与法国初创公司 Mistral AI 签订了一项多年协议，将在全行范围内整合生成式人工智能工具，旨在加快自动化进程、提高生产率并加强客户服务。【原文：HSBC said on Monday it had signed a multi-year deal with French start-up Mistral AI to integrate generative artificial intelligence tools across the bank, aiming to speed up automation, lift productivity, and enhance client services.】

item.title: 印度命令智能手机制造商预装国有网络安全应用程序
item.description: 印度电信部私下要求智能手机制造商在所有新设备中预装一个不能删除的国有网络安全应用程序，政府命令显示，此举很可能与苹果公司和隐私权倡导者对立。【原文：India's telecoms ministry has privately asked smartphone makers to preload all new devices with a state-owned cyber security app that cannot be deleted, a government order showed, a move likely to antagonise Apple and privacy advocates.】

item.title: 早间竞价加息前景暂时抑制日元跌势
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】
